metric.name: Avg Time to Obtain a DB Connection
Avg Time to Obtain a LDAP Connection
Avg Time to Add a Message
MySQL InnoDB Buffer Pool Hit Rate

plugin.help: The agent user must be in "zimbra" grop, and needs sudo access as root in order to access the appropriate files. Here is the link to the Zimbra wiki that describes a lot of the plugin metrics: http://wiki.zimbra.com/index.php?title=Log_Files
